com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.deps.serializer

Interface TwinPropertiesChangeCallback

  • Deprecated. 
    As of release 0.4.0, this interface is not necessary anymore.

    @Deprecated
public interface TwinPropertiesChangeCallback
    INNER TWINPARSER CLASS An interface for an IoT Hub Device Twin callback. Developers are expected to create an implementation of this interface, and the transport will call TwinPropertiesChangeCallback upon receiving a property changes from an IoT Hub Device Twin.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(Map<String,Object> propertyMap)
      Deprecated. 
      Executes the callback.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(Map<String,Object> propertyMap)
        Deprecated. 
        Executes the callback.
        Parameters:
        propertyMap - is a collection of properties that had its values changed.
